name: Bocock Brothers - World Traveler Connecticut - Robusto
additionalNotes: Bocock Brothers is a dynamic brand that emerged from the experience of Bryant Bocock in managing a famous nightclub in Honduras. After developing a passion for cigars, Bryant and his brother Douglas set out to change the perception of cigars by creating their own blends. After meticulous planning, travel and tastings, they launched the Bocock Brotherâ€™s World Traveler collection, offering a variety of blends inspired by their travels and new experiences. Their dedication to creating balanced and easy-to-smoke cigars promises to delight cigar lovers seeking exceptional and unique smoking experiences.
